thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Lesley Long

author: Lesley Long
title: Lesley Long
text: At last we can go on holiday and leave our 4 dogs in safe and friendly hands. Our first experience of Trusted Housesitters was brilliant. After 3 years we were finally able to take a break knowing our animals would be cared for and comfortable in their own surroundings. Our House Sitter was fantastic and we've make a new friend too. It was such a relief - we've already booked our holiday for 2018 and will be using Trusted House Sitters again next year. Worth every penny.
